text: DF/HCC STUDENT TRAINING PROGRAMS: MISSION DF/HCC provides high school college students underrepresented disadvantaged backgrounds comprehensive hands-mentored research experiences guidance academic professional development. mission : PROVIDE ACCESS MASSACHUSETTS YOUTH BUILD PIPELINE TALENTED DIVERSE STEM RESEARCHERS ACHIEVE MEASURABLE IMPACT YOUNG STEM PROFESSIONALS CREATE FACILITATE OPPORTUNITIES MENTORSHIP GRADUATE STUDENTS, POST DOCTORAL FELLOWS, FACULTY Background mentoring YES CURE Recruitment flyer Training mentors flyer
